name: Eduard and his friend
description: Very unfinished not even close but here is what we made in the time. You can not really play but jump and attack. The Friend completly bugged and there are no real levels. Sorry guys we couldnt finish. Was our first Game Jam ever and did it for the experience not becaue we were thinking we could finish. The idea was that the friend will betray you for a treasure and then you have to fight him in a boss fight.
